ROOT.GetAllEnds:
SELECT L.ID,E.ID,E.ST_ID,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,L.DCSYSTEM_ID,S.NAME,1 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINEEND_B E JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B L ON E.LINE_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_HVDCSYS_B S ON L.DCSYSTEM_ID=S.ID
UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,E.ID,E.ST_ID,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,'','',2 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINEEND_B E JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B L ON E.LINE_ID=L.ID WHERE VOLTAGE_TYPE IN (1001,1003,1005)
ROOT.GetAllAcLineEnds: SELECT L.ID,E.ID,E.ST_ID,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINEEND_B E JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B L ON E.LINE_ID=L.ID WHERE VOLTAGE_TYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,2000,2001,2002)
ROOT.GetAllDcLineEnds: SELECT L.ID,E.ID,E.ST_ID,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,L.DCSYSTEM_ID,S.NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINEEND_B E JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B L ON E.LINE_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_HVDCSYS_B S ON L.DCSYSTEM_ID=S.ID
ROOT.GetAcLineMeas: SELECT ACLINEEND_ID,{{1}} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_{{0}} WHERE CREATE_TIME={2} AND MEAS_TYPE={3}
ROOT.GetDcLineMeas: SELECT DCLINEEND_ID,{{1}} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_H1_MEA_{{0}} WHERE CREATE_TIME={2} AND MEAS_TYPE={3}
ROOT.GetPlantMeas: SELECT ID,{{1}} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_H1_MEA_{{0}} WHERE CREATE_TIME={2} AND MEAS_TYPE={3} AND {{1}} IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetBusBarMeas: SELECT A.ID,A.{{1}},B.ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_BUSBAR_H1_MEA_{{0}} a LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_BUSBAR_B b ON a.ID=b.ID WHERE a.CREATE_TIME={2} AND a.meas_type={3} AND b.VOLTAGE_TYPE BETWEEN 1001 AND 1005 AND A.{{1}} IS NOT NULL

d5000Station1.station: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_CON_SUBSTATION_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL
d5000Station1.plant: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_CON_PLANT_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL
d5000Station1.conver: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL

d5000Line.ac: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_DEV_ACLINE_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL
d5000Line.dc: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_DEV_DCLINE_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL

d5000Ends.ac: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_DEV_ACLINEEND_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL
d5000Ends.dc: SELECT D5000_ID,DCLOUD_ID FROM SG_DATACENTER.SG_DEV_DCLINEEND_C WHERE D5000_ID IS NOT NULL AND DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL

his.GetDcLineMeas: SELECT LINE_ID,P,P_CODE FROM YS_DB.YSH_E_DCLINEEND WHERE DATA_TIME={time}
his.GetAcLineMeas: SELECT LINEEND_ID,P,P_CODE FROM YS_DB.YSH_E_ACLINEEND WHERE DATA_TIME={time}

real.GetDcLineMeas: SELECT LINE_ID,P,P_CODE FROM YS_DB.YSH_E_DCLINEEND WHERE DATA_TIME=(SELECT MAX(DATA_TIME) FROM YS_DB.YSH_E_DCLINEEND)
real.GetAcLineMeas: SELECT LINEEND_ID,P,P_CODE FROM YS_DB.YSH_E_ACLINEEND WHERE DATA_TIME=(SELECT MAX(DATA_TIME) FROM YS_DB.YSH_E_ACLINEEND)
